name: Jump Squared
description: Jump Squared is a 2d platformer currently with 3 levels and your favorite main character - random blue square! Expect multiple updates after the initial release. I am planning on adding local leaderboards, extensive settings - not to mention a 4th level to properly finish the game. Want to give direct feedback? Join the discord server: https://discord.gg/UKdnJTh3R7  I appreciate every download :)
